verbs.description: Reps . Diane Black , Marsha Blackburn and Scott DesJarlais [V: have] signed a letter formally nominating President Donald Trump for the Nobel Prize .
[ARG0: Reps . Diane Black , Marsha Blackburn and Scott DesJarlais] have [V: signed] [ARG1: a letter formally nominating President Donald Trump for the Nobel Prize] .
Reps . Diane Black , Marsha Blackburn and Scott DesJarlais have signed [ARG0: a letter] [ARGM-MNR: formally] [V: nominating] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for the Nobel Prize] .
